Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpawnpointListener, TurretBlockListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpawnpointListener, TurretBlockListener
    This class implements the game board

                            java.util.Set<Block> toCheck)

        Parameters:
        alreadyChecked - blocks that have previously been checked
        toCheck - the blocks that will be checked
